mapper.sql: uuid, newsUuid, checker_uuid, result, reason, time
mapper.select:
select
from t_checkrecord where newsUuid = #{newsUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_checkrecord
uuid,
newsUuid,
checker_uuid,
result,
reason,
time,

mapper.update:
update t_checkrecord
newsUuid = #{newsUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checker_uuid = #{checker.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_checkrecord set newsUuid = #{newsUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checker_uuid = #{checker.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
